alert.note: Alert for Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 5:42PM EDT until June 20 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Richmond County in east central Georgia... West central Aiken County in central South Carolina... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 542 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over South Augusta, or near Fort Gordon, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... North Augusta, Fort Gordon, Augusta, Hephzibah, Glendale, South Augusta, Midtown, Summerville, Augusta Mall, Daniel Field, Augusta Regional Airport, West End Augusta, New Savannah Bluff Lock & Dam Park, Glenn Hills, Westover Memorial Park, Westover, Kroc Center, Richmond County Recreation Center, Phinizy Swamp Nature Park and Medical District Augusta. This includes the following highways... Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 2 and 15. Interstate 520 in South Carolina near mile marker 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways or walk through high water.
